activities: If you request information from us or wish to access certain features of the site, you will be asked to provide relevant and personally-identifying information so that we can respond effectively to your requests and needs. We will never share your information with anyone who isn't directly related to providing service and support of Virtual Premise. If you provide us with personal information, we may attempt to contact you occasionally to determine if our service meets your expectations, offer additional assistance or notify you about special promotions. Virtual Premise may perform professional services, such as data hosting, for clients during which it may be given access to personally-identified information of European Union Citizens employed by client or client customers.  This information is received only in the course of performing professional services.  We receive this information solely pursuant to written contracts. The information is not used for any purpose other than those specified in the contracts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
